Action.body: ~ibm.hlfab.aha.jira I have no idea what this is about.

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: This was opened from an email from someone.... I reviewed it, there were a couple of nuggets that have been resolved, or we're not at a spot that can be discussed as new features need to be implemented first. ... so closing this out.
